product_name: Salomon Trail Twinskin Shorts - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The Salomon Trail Twinkskin Shorts pair inner compression shorts with lightweight outer shorts to deliver lasting comfort for long runs over trails or around the city. Inner and outer shorts feature lightweight, breathable stretch-polyester fabric that wicks moisture away from skin and dries quickly. Built-in UPF 40 sun protection shields skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. Shorts feature single-layer construction at inner thigh to eliminate chafing; elastic waistband offers a secure fit. Salomon Trail Twinskin Shorts feature reflective details to increase visibility in low light. Closeout.
short_description: The Salomon Trail Twinkskin Shorts pair inner compression shorts with lightweight outer shorts to deliver lasting comfort for long runs over trails or around the city.
